thread.title: Ana zanga-zangar adawa da matsin rayuwa a Najeriya - Afrika - RFI
thread.title_full: Ana zanga-zangar adawa da matsin rayuwa a Najeriya - Afrika - RFI

author: Awwal Ahmad Janyau
title: Ana zanga-zangar adawa da matsin rayuwa a Najeriya - Afrika - RFI
text:
Wanda aka canza zuwa 06-02-2017 A 15:26 Ana zanga-zangar adawa da gwamnatin Buhari a Abuja da Lagos REUTERS 
‘Yan Najeriya na gudanar da zanga-zangar lumana a biranen Abuja da Lagos domin janyo hankalin gwamnati ga halin tsadar rayuwa da suke ciki, a yayin da kuma wasu ke gudanar zanga-zangar nuna goyon baya ga gwamnatin Muhammadu Buhari. 
An kaddamar da zanga-zangar ne duk da wawakin Najeriya 2face wanda ya fara kiran gangamin ya janye kudirinsa saboda gudun abinda zai biyo baya. 
Mutane da dama ne suka fito a Lagos da Abuja a yau Litinin suna zanga-zangar nuna damuwa da tsadar rayuwa da kuma yadda gwamnatin Buhari ke tafiyar da tattalin arzikin kasar. 
Wannan na zuwa a yayin da Shugaban ya tsawaita hutunsa a London saboda ci gaba da samun magani a daidai lokacin da ‘Yan Najeriya ke jiran dawowarsa a jiya Lahadi. 
A sanarwar da kakakinsa ya fitar Femi Adishina ya ce likitoci ne suka bukaci shugaban ya tsawaita hutun domin samun damar kammala gwaje gwajen da suke yi tare da samun sakamako. 
Amma wasu ‘Yan Najeriya na ganin ya dace shugaban ya fito a sakon bidoyo domin su tabbatar da lafiyarsa tare da kwantar da hankalin ‘yan kasa. 
‘Yan Najeriya da dama sun fito zanga-zanga a London inda suka bukaci shugaban ya fito ya yi Magana na tsawon minti biyar domin su tabbatar da yana cikin koshin lafiya. 'Yan Najeriya a Birtaniya sun bukaci Buhari ya fito ya yi magana na minti 5 Nigerians in the U.K. Protesting in front of the Nigerian High Comission Demanding for a 5-Min Speech from Pres. Buhari. #Naijablogger pic.twitter.com/r8wvxSeNUy — Samuel Date360 (@Naijablogger) February 6, 2017 Masu Zanga-zangar adawa da matsin rayuwa a Lagos #istandwithNigeria pictures: from Ojuelegba with love...It's been very peaceful so far!!! @Gidi_Traffic RT pic.twitter.com/jCny3TpXMB
